headline: Formo Raises $50M to Scale Precision Fermentation Cheese
summary: Formo secured funding to expand production of its animal-free cheese made via precision fermentation technology.

headline: Bolt Threads Partners with Adidas for Mylo Mushroom Leather Apparel
summary: Bolt Threads collaborates with Adidas to create apparel using Mylo, a sustainable mushroom-based leather alternative.

headline: Solar Foods Factory Opens, Producing Solein Protein from Air
summary: Solar Foods commences production at its factory, creating Solein protein through gas fermentation using air and electricity.

headline: Modern Synthesis Secures Funding for Microbial Textile Platform
summary: Modern Synthesis obtains investment to scale its platform producing sustainable textiles using microbial fermentation processes.

headline: Perfect Day Announces Partnership with Nestle for Animal-Free Dairy Products
summary: Perfect Day teams up with Nestle to develop and market dairy products using their precision fermentation whey protein.

headline: Algiknit Expands Production of BioKnit Yarn Made From Seaweed
summary: Algiknit scales up manufacturing of BioKnit, a sustainable yarn derived from seaweed for use in textile applications.

headline: Change Foods Launches Animal-Free Dairy Cheese in Select Markets
summary: Change Foods introduces its precision fermentation-based dairy cheese alternatives to consumers in specific regions.

headline: Geltor Partners with Material Companies for Sustainable Collagen Alternatives
summary: Geltor collaborates with various material manufacturers to integrate its fermentation-derived collagen into products.

headline: Air Protein Receives Regulatory Approval for Novel Protein Ingredient
summary: Air Protein gains regulatory clearance for its protein ingredient produced through gas fermentation from air, CO2, and renewable energy.

headline: Biomason Raises Series C to Scale Biocement Production
summary: Biomason secures funding to increase production of its biocement, a sustainable alternative to traditional cement.
